[http://h10010.www1.hp.com/wwpc/us/en/sm/WF06c/A10-51210-64274-1130363-64274-3769770-3769771-3769773.html Product Page]
[http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/SoftwareDescription.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&prodTypeId=12454&prodSeriesId=3658390&prodNameId=3658391&swEnvOID=4052&swLang=13&mode=2&taskId=135&swItem=vc-76967-1 Windows 7 Driver from HP] 05/19/2009,3.00.01.0000
[http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/SoftwareDescription.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&prodTypeId=12454&prodSeriesId=3658390&prodNameId=3658391&swEnvOID=2097&swLang=13&mode=2&taskId=135&swItem=vc-67618-1 Windows Vista/XP Driver from HP]
You may also use the latest drivers from [http://www.ralinktech.com/support.php ralink]
Lots of images of the card [http://bbs.pc3w.com/TopicOther.asp?t=5&BoardID=5&id=657850 here] This card appears to be a '''[[Lite-On]]''' PPQ-WN7600R. The FCC ID of that device has been assigned to this entry. [[Category:English Documentation]]
